entry.data:
SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
